      • survivablePiece

        Piece survivablePiece(Player pl)
        It chooses and returns the final piece that the player has lost and brings it back into play. This piece could not be a trap. If there is not a valid piece which could be returnable, function returns null
        Parameters:
        pl - player
        Returns:
        the piece that it will be survuve
